titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to increase the amount of the military death gratuity from $12,000 to $75,000.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 10/4/2004--Introduced. Increases to $75,000 the amount of death gratuity payable with respect to members of the Armed Forces. Makes this increase applicable with respect to deaths occurring on or after September 11, 2001.
